why: Promotion adaption of Korean life by leading entrance of foreign workers who has basic understanding of Korean and evaluation of the level of Korean language skills of foreign job seekers and Korean Society, It can be used as objective selection criteria for the list of foreign job seekers.

headers: Section, Evalutation field, Number for item of questions

evaluationContent: Basic communication skills needed in everyday life in Korea
Korean language skills needed in industry
requirements: Male or Female from 18 to 39 years old
No deportation from Republic of Korea
No restriction on immigration (reason for disqualification)
evalutationMethod: Criteria to determine a successful candidate: Scores above the lowest score per industry. Successful candidate determined in the order of merit within selecting (anticipating) number of people.
